title: Push-Ups
benefits: The push-up is considered a staple to effective workout routines. It’s simple yet effective for building strength, arms, chest, and shoulders.

title: Squats
benefits: It helps you get in better shape when included in daily workout plan. Strengthens lower body muscles for men.

title: Yoga
benefits: Maintaining a regular different types of yoga practice can provide physical and mental health benefits.

title: Walking
benefits: Walking for 30 minutes a day or more on most days of the week is a great way to improve or maintain your overall health.

title: Skipping Rope
benefits: Skipping rope helps to tone your calves, tighten your core, build stamina and improve your lung capacity.

title: Dumbbell Rows
benefits: Dumbbell rows can strengthen the back and increase muscle growth. An increase in muscle strength also causes the body to burn more calories.

title: Lunges
benefits: Lunges increase muscle mass to build up strength and tone your body, especially your core, butt, and legs.

title: Cross Crunches
benefits: It’s more effective and easy exercise for abs and the oblique muscles. It strengthens the core and strengthens your abdominal muscles.

title: Side Plank
benefits: Side planks help build core strength, which can help reduce lower back pain. Side planks work the buttocks, hips, and abdominal muscles.
